mema jiwin jalayata muda harinu labana bijuwalin hataganna janithayan da ek wemin wasara dahas gananak thula me kolaniwalin awasan prathipalaya wana sundara koralpara hatagani.galu werale apa randi sitina kuda walla hewath bonawista parayata amatharawa loka prasiddha hikkaduwa ambalangoda mathara thangalla rakawa maha rawana ha kuda rawana, pasikuda, kalkuda, nilaweli, kuchchaweli, mannarama, kalpitiya, aadi lesa diwayina watama werala thirawala da yapanaya ha delf wani thadasanna dupathwala da koralpara sulabhawa wyapthawa thibunath lokaye boho werala thirayan koral para labannata tharam wasanawantha wi natha.nirakshaye sita anshaka 30 bagin uthuru ha dakunu dishawanta athi simitha pradeshayak thula pamanak mitara 50 dakwa gambauru athi hiru eliya watena pradeshawala pamani.
